verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Amidst us our Beloved stands, And bids us view His pierced hands; Points to the wounded feet and side, Blest emblems of the Crucified.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: What food luxurious loads the board When, at His table, sits the Lord! The wine how rich, the bread how sweet, When Jesus deigns the guests to meet!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: If now, with eyes defiled and dim, We see the signs, but see not Him; Oh, may His love the scales displace, And bid us see Him face to face!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Thou glorious Bridegroom of our hearts, Thy present smile Thy grace imparts! Oh, lift the veil, if veil there be, Let every saint Thy glory see!
